description: This Dart source file defines the MenuProvider class, which manages and provides access to a list of menu items for a Flutter application. The class handles loading data (simulated with a delay), notifies listeners of state changes, and provides methods for data retrieval.

classes.name: MenuProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier class managing a list of MenuItemModel objects, including loading mock data and providing accessors.

methods.name: loadMenu
methods.description: Simulates loading menu data asynchronously, updates internal state, and notifies listeners.

methods.name: byId
methods.description: Retrieves a MenuItemModel by its ID if present, otherwise returns null.
